author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
This PR is for L1T Offline software l1t-tsg-v9.2 (v86.1) + correct changes introduced unintentionally by the L1T O2O PR

Details:
When merged L1T O2O PR (#15842), the core L1T emulation of calo and muon trigger objects
was affected due to a changes in L1TCalorimeter and L1TMuon packages. 
Unit tests of L1T emulation did not bit-wise agree before and after the O2O merge.

DONE: Bit-wise agreement for calo objects (jets, sums, taus, eg's was re-obtained) after reverting L1TCaloParamsESProducer

DONE: Bit-wise agreement for muon objects after configuring L1TMuonGlobalParamsESProducer to
not use Xml files.
title: PR 80x v86.1 tsg-9.2 post O2O PR merge
